activities.name: Algorithm Design Challenge
activities.description: Collaboratively design an efficient sorting strategy.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Identify the constraints of the sorting problem.

phases.name: propose
phases.prompt: Suggest a specific algorithm (e.g., QuickSort vs MergeSort).

phases.name: critique
phases.prompt: Discuss the Big O complexity and memory trade-offs.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Select the final algorithm to implement.

activities.name: Design Pattern Debate
activities.description: Compare three different software development methodologies.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Outline the key principles of Agile, Waterfall, and Scrum.

phases.name: propose
phases.prompt: Advocate for one methodology based on a project with well defined requirements and tight deadlines.

phases.name: critique
phases.prompt: Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of each approach.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Choose the most suitable methodology for a sample project.

activities.name: Code safty review
activities.description: Review a piece of code for potential safety and security issues.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Identify the main functionalities of the code snippet provided.

phases.name: propose
phases.prompt: Highlight potential safety and security vulnerabilities in the code.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Recommend specific improvements to enhance code safety and security.

activities.name: Network Topology Optimization
activities.Description: Design a resilient network for a small office with high uptime requirements.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: List the hardware required for a basic LAN.

phases.name: propose
phases.prompt: Suggest a topology (Star, Mesh, etc.) to handle a single point of failure.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Finalize the hardware list and topology map.

activities.name: Database normalization
activities.Description: Turn the given database into 3rd normal form

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Identify the current normal form of the database and how each object relates to each other.

phases.name: propose
phases.prompt: Suggest changes to eliminate redundancy and ensure data integrity.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Finalize the normalized database schema.

activities.name: Syntacx Error Hunt
activities.description: Identify and correct syntax errors in a provided code snippet.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Review the given code and assess its intended functionality.

phases.name: spot
phases.prompt: List all syntax errors found in the code snippet.

phases.name: fix
phases.prompt: Provide corrected code with explanations for each change made.

activities.name: Open source v Proprietary
activities.description: Debate the merits of open source software versus proprietary software for a online multiplayer game.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Define open source and proprietary software, including key characteristics of each.

phases.name: pros and cons
phases.prompt: List out the pros and cons of each model for this specific scenario.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Conclude which model is more advantageous.

phases.name: reflect
phases.prompt: Reflect on how your choice can have negative impacts for a multiplayer game.

activities.name: Remote vs In-Office
activities.description: Discuss the benefits and challenges of remote work versus in-office work for a tech startup.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Define remote work and in-office work, including key characteristics of each.

phases.name: pros and cons
phases.prompt: List out the pros and cons of each work arrangement for a tech startup.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Conclude which work arrangement is more advantageous for a tech startup.

activities.name: Spotting AI in code
activities.description: Identify where in the given code snippet code is likely generated by AI tools.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Review the provided code snippet and its intended functionality.

phases.name: identify
phases.prompt: Highlight sections of the code that exhibit characteristics typical of AI-generated code.

phases.name: explain
phases.prompt: Provide reasoning for why those sections are likely AI-generated.

activities.name: Accesabilty in consumer apps
activities.description: Evaluate a popular consumer app for accessibility features and suggest improvements.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Review the app and identify existing accessibility features.

phases.name: evaluate
phases.prompt: Assess the effectiveness of these features for users with disabilities.

phases.name: recommend
phases.prompt: Suggest specific improvements to enhance accessibility.

activities.name: Data breach review
activities.description: Analyze Under Armour's recent data breach and its implications.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Define a data breach and its potential impacts.

phases.name: analyze
phases.prompt: Examine the details of Under Armour's data breach.

phases.name: evaluate
phases.prompt: Assess the company's response and effectiveness of their mitigation efforts.

activities.name: Check out design
activities.description: Create a step-by-step guide for checking out a design in an e-commerce app.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Review the e-commerce app and identify what is specifically needed for the checkout process.

phases.name: evaluate
phases.prompt: Assess the usability and accessibility of the checkout process you have come up with.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Finalize the step-by-step guide for checking out a design in the app.

activities.name: Code Language Review
activities.description: Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of python, java and c++ for different applications.

phases.name: understand
phases.prompt: Outline the key features of Python, Java, and C++.

phases.name: pros and cons
phases.prompt: List out the pros and cons of each language for web development, mobile apps, and system programming.

phases.name: decide
phases.prompt: Conclude which language is most suitable for each application type.
